mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.name, t1.category_id, t1.manufacturer_id, t1.item_no, t1.order_number, t1.purchase_date, t1.purchase_cost, t1.quantity, t1.min_quantity, t1.location_id, t1.create_time, t1.update_time, t1.deleted, t2.name AS categoryName, t3.name AS manufacturerName, t4.name AS locationName FROM itam_consumables t1 LEFT JOIN itam_categories t2 ON t1.category_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN itam_manufacturers t3 ON t1.manufacturer_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN itam_locations t4 ON t1.location_id = t4.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
